constants.label: The One Who Is Beyond
notes: Exists outside all universes as the absolute constant.
Issues the mandate that universes must be observed, not ruled.

constants.label: The One Who Is Bound
notes: Represents ruin and malice beyond mortal scale.

constants.label: The All Seeing
notes: One consciousness expressed through three bodies.
Tasked by the Beyond to observe every universe.

constants.label: The Grand Jury
notes: Judges entities of extreme moral collapse.
